title: Border Fragment, 17th–18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, vegetable fiber?
Technique: uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of a band for a border. Design of flower and branch in white, blue, black, and green loose pile on yellow silk ground. Weft of coarse vegetable fiber.
